thread.title: Great stay.
thread.title_full: Great stay. - Review of Hotel Napoleon Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: jacu2017
title: Great stay.
text:
Hotel Napoleon offered exactly what we were looking for during our March 7-10, 2017, stay in Paris. Great location, just a half block from the Arc de Triomphe, helpful staff and a comfortable, nicely decorated room. Highly recommend.
Room Tip: Asked for a room high up and in the back (you forego the view, but no street noise.) See more room tips
